name: Attecat
tagline: Attendance tracking software in php, sqlite, jquery-ui. Tracks attendance based on a numerical score, as well as daily notes for each student and an overall notepad for each student.
body:
This is php/sqlite3 software to keep track of student attendance, which I made with the help of my wife, a middle-school teacher. It is functional, but could use some polishing and more features. Message for a live demo URL. 

The main screen with daily attendance input:
![Main screen](http://xenotropic.net/timecat/attecat1.jpg)

View of a student, showing all attendance records and general notes that can be updated. 
![Student screen](http://xenotropic.net/timecat/attecat1.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
